has research problem.from sentence: Focal Visual - Text Attention for Visual Question Answering

Visual question answering ( VQA ) is a successful direction utilizing both computer vision and natural language processing techniques to solve an interesting problem : given a pair of image and a question ( in natural language ) , the goal is to learn an inference model that can the answer questions according to cues discovered from the image .
Extending from VQA on a single image , this paper considers the following problem :
